## Adding a Bundle

**Bundle name:**
**Repository:**
**Category:**

### Checklist

- [ ] Bundle is published and functional.
- [ ] Repository is public with source code.
- [ ] Entry uses the correct format: `- [Name](url) - Description.`
- [ ] Description starts with a capital letter and ends with a period.
- [ ] Entry is in alphabetical order within its category.
- [ ] Bundle name is not repeated in the description.
- [ ] Links are valid and point to the correct repository.
- [ ] I have read the [contributing guidelines](contributing.md).
